page.title: 19EMPLOYMENT OF SCHOOL PUPILS
page.content: A large number of the pupils who attend the High Schools in the area have evening and Saturday jobs.These provide the children with additional pocket money or as extra income for their families. The usual range of work is undertaken including newspaper delivery,shop work and milk delivery but Blackpool provides a whole host of other jobs, some of which prove to be most lucrative.Many pupils help in the hotels and guest houses run by their parents or by other people.Others find work on the Pleasure Beach or in the numerous cafes and snack bars that abound on or near the promenade. Whilst most of the pupils receive a fair rate of pay and work within the permitted number of hours there are a considerable number who are exploited and break the permitted hours laws.
